name: Everyclick
overview: Everyclick is a search engine which helps users raise money for charity.

milestones.description: Everyclick makes online fundraising accessible to all UK Charities
milestones.source_text:
Everyclick has announced the launch of a comprehensive online giving
platform, designed to help all UK charities address the low uptake of
online giving.

This new platform offers all 200,000 UK charities a one-stop resource
for collecting online donations, powering supporters' sponsorship pages
and running online appeals. These services are in addition to
Everyclick's market leading charity search engine which has already
raised nearly GBP500,000.

By giving every UK charity easy access to a range of online fundraising
services, Everyclick is driving a new era of giving via the internet.
The new Everyclick platform will prove particularly beneficial for
smaller charities who have not been able to fundraise online. Only 41%*
of charities with a turnover of less than GBP1m have the facilities to
collect online donations.

Announcing the new site features, Polly Gowers, Founder of Everyclick
said:

"Currently just 2% of the UK's GBP8 billion*donated to charity is given
online. Think of how this compares to how many of us buy a holiday or
bank online. With such a small percentage of the UK public giving
online, Everyclick is pioneering the way for all charities to benefit
from the web.

We are the only website where internet users can fundraise for their
favourite charity in a variety of ways. Everyclick's users can search
the web, shop online, make a donation and create a sponsorship page to
raise funds for any charity they wish.

We are proud to have developed a single platform that can provide an
online fundraising solution for all the UK's charities. We are looking
forward to seeing our technology make a direct impact on their income.
Our aim is to power a "virtual collection tin" on as many websites,
blogs and social network pages as possible and see online giving become
as popular as online shopping."

Everyclick's new services are not just available via the Everyclick
website, they can also be seamlessly integrated to any third-party
website via the Everyclick Widget.

These significant enhancements reinforce the Everyclick mission to open
up new fundraising channels to all UK charities at minimum cost. The
Everyclick donation services ensure more of a supporters money goes to
the charity of their choice.***

* Data sourced from NfP Synergy 2008

**Data sourced from NfP Synergy 2007

***Please see Notes to Editors for a competitor comparison

Notes to Editors:

Everyclick.com

--Launched in 2005, Everyclick.com offers a seamless online giving
platform for schools, businesses, charities and individuals.

--The Everyclick.com search engine is the 8th most used search engine
in the UK that has been purpose built to automatically donate 50% of
its revenue to charity, and to date has over 122,000 registered users
who have helped raise nearly GBP500,000 for UK Charities.

--Everyclick.com is aHitwise Top 10 Award winner, and winner of the
Netimperative "Best Start Up of the Year" Award

--Polly Gowers, CEO, was the winner of the Triodos Bank sponsored
"Entrepreneur of the Year" at the Women in Ethical Business Awards 2007
and a Blackberry Women in Technology Award 2008
milestones.source_description: Everyclick: Everyclick makes online fundraising accessible to all UK Charities
